actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend part A of title IV of the Social Security Act to eliminate the separate work participation rate for 2-parent families under the temporary assistance for needy families programs.
short_title: Equality for Two-Parent Families Act of 2006

summary.text: Equality for Two-Parent Families Act of 2006 - Amends part A (Temporary Assistance for Needy Families) (TANF) of title IV of the Social Security Act to eliminate the separate work participation rate for two-parent families (thus subjecting all families on TANF to the same rate). Declares that a family that includes a disabled parents shall not be treated as a two-parent family.

titles.title: Equality for Two-Parent Families Act of 2006
A bill to amend part A of title IV of the Social Security Act to eliminate the separate work participation rate for 2-parent families under the temporary assistance for needy families programs.
